name: Scare House
description:
This game was made by the following team members as part of the 2019 Global Game Jam:

Anita Salamanca
David Keep
Ellie Balson
Rin Mcbeath

The theme for this particular GGJ was "What home means to you".
We made a game about moving out of home for the first time, into a share house with some strange folks. It takes some getting used to these sorts of changes, but it can be incredibly freeing, particularly for people who may not have felt at home where they were before.

This game aims to be inclusive and as such we have decided to avoid using gendered pronouns and traditional expectations of sexuality.
It's 2019, baby. Gender is out and puzzle games are in.
